summary: A Hawaii travel guide web page with an additional dining Hawaii blog section.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Overhead shot of a classic Hawaiian poke bowl with fresh ahi tuna, rice, and toppings (dining-poke-bowl.dim_800x600.png)
- Colorful Hawaiian shave ice dessert with tropical syrup flavors at a beachside stand (dining-shave-ice.dim_800x600.png)
- Traditional Hawaiian plate lunch with kalua pork, rice, and macaroni salad (dining-plate-lunch.dim_800x600.png)
- Festive Hawaiian luau feast spread with roasted pig, tropical fruits, and poi (dining-luau-feast.dim_800x600.png)
- Upscale open-air Hawaiian restaurant with ocean view and tropical decor at sunset (dining-fine-dining.dim_800x600.png)
- Fresh tropical fruit market stall in Hawaii with pineapples, mangoes, and papayas (dining-fruit-market.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a visually rich Hawaii travel guide landing page featuring sections for: a hero banner with Hawaii imagery and headline, top destinations (e.g., Oahu, Maui, Big Island, Kauai) with descriptions and images, featured activities (e.g., surfing, snorkeling, hiking, luau), best travel tips, and a footer with basic info.

Apply a warm tropical visual theme throughout the page: use sun-soaked warm tones (golden yellows, coral, ocean teal, sandy beige), tropical-style typography, smooth scroll navigation between sections, and card-based layouts for destinations and activities. Ensure the design is consistent and immersive.
Use the generated static images (stored in frontend/public/assets/generated) as visuals for the hero banner and destination/activity cards throughout the Hawaii guide page.

Create a dedicated Dining Hawaii blog page/section featuring local restaurants, Hawaiian food culture, and culinary experiences. Include a blog-style layout with featured dining posts, each containing a title, description, cuisine type tag, location (island), and an image. Cover topics such as plate lunch culture, shave ice, poke bowls, luau feasts, and fine dining options across the islands.

Apply the existing warm tropical visual theme (golden yellows, coral, ocean teal, sandy beige, tropical typography) consistently to the new Dining Hawaii blog section, using card-based layouts that match the style of the existing destinations and activities sections.
Use generated static images (stored in frontend/public/assets/generated) as visuals for the dining blog cards and any hero/banner area for the dining section.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a dining Hawaii blog section/page featuring local restaurants, food culture, and culinary experiences in Hawaii
